author: https://github.com/stfc-sciml
description: (this is slstr_cloud_ds1) The benchmark includes two datasets of slstr_cloud_ds1 and cloud_slstr_ds2, with sizes of 180GB and 4.9TB, respectively. Each dataset is made up of two parts: reflectance and brightness temperature. The reflectance is captured across six channels with the resolution of 2400 x 3000 pixels, and the brightness temperature is captured across three channels with the resolution of 1200 x 1500 pixels.
